summary: realVision ENB with changed post process settings
descriptionHtml:
[color=#e06666][size=5]Now I've posted a new version and it'll look better. Pls update to the latest version.[/size]

[/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/MtpWRsk.png[/img]


[size=4]Description[/size]

[color=#cccccc] Skyrim players install ENB Series to improve the game's graphic. But some problems of ENB Series mods are that they are [/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]too dark at night and interiors, too bright, too sharp, too saturated, too gloomy, too foggy and too unrealistic[/size][/color][color=#cccccc].[/color]

[color=#cccccc] Goal of this post is to guide the players to have natural looking, beautiful [/color][color=#f4f4f4][size=3](Not over-enhanced, not over-done) [/size][/color][color=#cccccc][size=2]graphics for Skyrim. I've posted pictures below and they all are really great looking. To have the graphics like this, you'll have to install all the mods in the list below.

[/size][/color]
[color=#1e84cc][size=4]What is realVision reEdited

[/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][size=3] I'm not a mod maker. I don't make any mod[/size]. realVision reEdited is a Rar File which contains saved settings of customised post process effects of realVision that will give you look like exactly in the pictures shown below. Even if you install realVision, your graphics will still look a bit unrealistic (I'm not telling that realVision is not good). So I played with some post process settings of [/color][color=#9fc5e8]realVision (which you can also do yourself by pressing shift + Enter) and found that the result was really improved a lot from original realVision so I decided to help the players who don't like unrealistic, overdone ENB graphics.
[/color]

[color=#f6b26b][size=4]Please install all the mods in the list if you can to have the graphics shown in the pictures
[/size][/color]
Special thanks and I give credit to all the original mod makers

[color=#999999]pls search the mods your self[/color]
[size=3]Very important mods[/size]

-SKSE
-realVision ENBSeries
-HD Skyrim 2K textures
-Static Mesh Improvement mods
-Enhanced Lights and FX (don't install the weather system)

[size=3]important mods
[/size]
-Realistic Water Two
-AOF Detailed Mountains
-PP Whiterun Vanilla and SRO
-The Skyrim Distance Overhaul

[size=3]-Optional mods[/size]

-Dust Effects
-HD Ivy
-HD Misc
-HD Enhanced Terrain Pro
-Revamped Exterior Fog
-SkyFalls and SkyMills
-Skyrim Particle Patch

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zkbyOME.jpg[/img]


[color=#00ffff][size=5]Installation Steps
[/size][/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]if you installed any other ENB Series, delete them with [/color][color=#1e84cc][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7804/?]ENB FXAA SweetFX Manager and Remover[/url][/size][/color]

[color=#d8d8d8]-download Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]-install SKSE with NMM[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]-install RealVision ENB (I'll show you the steps to install it below)[/color]

[size=3]How to install RealVision[/size]
[color=#d8d8d8]-download [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/download.htm][color=#1e84cc]latest ENB Series[/color][/url].[color=#d8d8d8]
-copy d39d.dll and enbhost.exe form "WrapperVersion" folder into game folder
-download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]realVision[/url]
-copy and paste all files from "00 - Main files" \ "RealVision_ENB_files" into your game folder
-copy and paste all files from "00 - Option A Full" \ "RealVision_ENB_files" into your game folder
-copy and paste all files from "03 - Depth of Field - Default" \ "RealVision_ENB_files" into your game folder[/color]

How to install RealVision reEdited
-extract the realVision reEdited rar file, copy and paste all the files into game folder (you need to install realVision first)

open SkyrimPrefs.ini in Documents\My Games\skyrim and change

[b]iMultiSample=0
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=1
fGamma=1.0000
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

[/b]Set antialising and anisotropic filtering to "off" in Skyrimlauncher options. 

[color=#d8d8d8]-install the mods in the lists [/color][color=#ff0000](otherwise, it'll not look like the graphics shown in the pictures)[/color]
[color=#d8d8d8]done![/color][color=#d8d8d8]


[/color][color=#cccccc]Pls give comments[/color] if you face errors [color=#cccccc]or[/color] if there are problems with rules of this site [color=#b6b6b6]or[/color] if you like it


These all are realtime- in game screenshots. Not photoshopped at all[img]http://i.imgur.com/dR9XNGo.jpg[/img]

If you love this cute elf, this is Tania the Hermit mod.



[img]http://i.imgur.com/AMXuxO9.jpg[/img]
author: ThuraOo
